Graduation Form Submission
==========================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | May 16, 2022 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/3-980x646.png)

Attention to final semester students (semester 2021/2022-2) of taught course programs at the School of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia. Here is the link to submit the documents related to your graduation.

[**CLICK HERE FOR MORE DETAILS**](https://forms.gle/EJ3rnkBLuXs2FtoR9)

Thank you.

Close this module

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/CSI-FKE-2025-1.jpeg)
